title: 87/322/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 June 1987 approving an addendum to the programme relating to beef/veal and pigmeat submitted by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany for the Land of Baden- Württemberg pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 June 1987
approving an addendum to the programme relating to beef/veal and pigmeat submitted by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany for the Land of Baden-Wuerttemberg pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the German text is authentic)
(87/322/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The addendum to the programme relating to beef/veal and pigmeat in the Land of Baden-Wuerttemberg forwarded by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany concerning which supplementary information was submitted on 20 October 1986 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 June 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 6.
